text_block_list.text: While walking with Matikanetannhauser, I spotted Rice Shower looking troubled...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Rice-san, is something wrong? Are you having some trouble?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, yeah... This vending machine won't give me any juice.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-since I tried to buy it, maybe I broke it because of me...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I see, I see. In that case, shall I try to fix it?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's fine, I fixed it when the TV at my parents' house stopped working too!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-but... this is my fault, so having you do it is...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No need to hold back. Come on, let's cheer up this machine that's gotten its belly button in a twist!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There, there, there... Vending machine-chan, did something bad happen?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: You've been working nonstop. You must be tired... Oh, want to eat a battery?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's okay, don't hold back! It's a present for you for working so hard!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And so... beep beep!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Phew... When I repeated this until it was fixed, the TV turned on with a flash, you know?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, really? Hmm, now that you mention it...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Then I'll keep trying until it's fixed. Hmph!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No... this is too much trouble. Sorry for taking up your time? I'll figure it out on my own from here...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It's not trouble at all! In fact, I'm having fun with it!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh... you're having fun?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm not normal, right? So, I get all excited about these 'not normal' things!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Rather, thank you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I-I'm the one who wants to thank you.
Not just for the repairs, but for saying something like that...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser-san... thank you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
No, no, it's nothing!
Well then, shall we resume the repairs?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, should we try a different method?
Like, a more 'bang' kind of approach...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Trainer! Lend me your wisdom!
The 'bang' kind of thing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Trainer! Lend me your wisdom!
The 'bang' kind of thing!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So we need to pour more love into the vending machine!
Yeah yeah, let's do it~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Vending machine-chan... are you okay like this?
If you don't stand up now, when will you!?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, um... fight...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Oh, thank you too, Rice-san!
The vending machine must be itching to move now, right?

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
My... you two, why are you
talking to the vending machine?

As Tazuna-san, who happened to be passing by, plugged in
the disconnected power cord, the vending machine
simply came back to life.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, it wasn't broken!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
No, please give me just a little more chance.
I'll bring out my secret weapon.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wait just a moment~~!

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
Matikanetannhauser-san ran off at an incredible speed...
Did something happen?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Um... actually--

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
...Yes, this should do it.
Maybe someone got caught on the plug.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Phew... so it wasn't broken.
I have to tell Tannhauser-san...!
A few minutes later, Matikanetannhauser returned with an armful of tools.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh, it's fixed already!?
